mapper.insert: insert into item(itemName, sale, itemCountM, itemCountL, itemCountXL, mainImg, subImg1, subImg2, subImg3, subImg4, categoryNum) values (#{itemName},#{sale},#{itemCountM},#{itemCountL},#{itemCountXL},#{mainImg},#{subImg1}, #{subImg2},#{subImg3},#{subImg4},#{categoryNum})
mapper.update: update item set itemName = #{itemName}, sale = #{sale}, itemCountM = #{itemCountM}, itemCountL = #{itemCountL}, itemCountXL = #{itemCountXL}, mainImg = #{mainImg}, subImg1 = #{subImg1}, subImg2 = #{subImg2}, subImg3 = #{subImg3}, subImg4 = #{subImg4}, categoryNum = #{categoryNum} where itemNum = #{itemNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from wishlist where itemNum=#{itemNum} and email=#{email}
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where itemNum=#{itemNum} and email=#{email}
mapper.select: select itemNum from wishlist where email = #{email}
